dcterms:description: A dataset of 13,240 tweets annotated for offensive language identification, categorization of offense types, and target identification. The dataset includes three sub-tasks: identifying offensive language, categorizing offense types, and identifying the target of the offense.
dcterms:title: OffensEval Dataset
